Internal Factory for RMST Simulation Functions (Bootstrap)

Source: R/multiplicative_stratified_boot.R, R/multiplicative_stratified_boot_app.R
dot-get_internal_simulation_runner.Rd

This is a non-exported helper function that sets up and returns another function responsible for running the core bootstrap simulation logic. This factory pattern helps reduce code duplication between the public-facing power and sample size functions. It prepares the model formula and pilot data and returns the run_power_sim function which is then called repeatedly.

This is a non-exported helper function that sets up and returns another function responsible for running the core bootstrap simulation logic. This factory pattern helps reduce code duplication between the public-facing power and sample size functions. It prepares the model formula and pilot data and returns the run_power_sim function which is then called repeatedly.

Usage

.get_internal_simulation_runner(
  pilot_data,
  time_var,
  status_var,
  arm_var,
  strata_var,
  linear_terms,
  L,
  alpha,
  n_sim,
  parallel.cores
)

.get_internal_simulation_runner(
  pilot_data,
  time_var,
  status_var,
  arm_var,
  strata_var,
  linear_terms,
  L,
  alpha,
  n_sim,
  parallel.cores
)

Value

A function that takes n_per_stratum and runs the simulation.

A function that takes n_per_stratum and runs the simulation.
